name: PurrMania
description:
"Welcome  to PURRMANIA !  Try your luck   skill  in this  awful  awesome game.

Awaken  Call the great Purrmallow for help and  let him rise from the abyss  bring  destruction   love upon the town, with the power of  extreme violence  friendship,.

Convert   Hug  the heretics to death wonderfull and loving humans, all within a retro -looking cheap  environement .  Face a ugly as hell   the evil  dog : Baron Eugène in a ridiculous epic battle  for the glory of cat Satan  a world full of love and peace.

Gotta hug them all  !

PRAISE PURRMALLOW FILTHY HUMANS ! "

PURRMANIA ! Is an action/combat game  in 3d , where you  play as Purrmallow, a cat who as been risen from nowhere (cat hell maybe ?)  to  restore the fallen reputation of cats, who are rejected by all humans.  To do so, use your power,  the Hug and the Purrwave as weapons against angry humans, bringing them love and relaxing purrs (a whole new world of fluffiness).
